plot: Directed by Julio Bracho, challenges or is about Rogelio Ram rez, an experienced race car stock in M xico is competing for the Championship with the escuder Seman Baker. The team who heads the season, Herdez Quaker, offers you to join their lines l, and thus the opportunity to run abroad. But its decision implies dealing with dubiosos characters and leave the people who supported him to reach far est. Filmed with the support of escuder ACE and professional drivers, challenges or is an exciting and entertaining film about the world of high velocidad.bobbytanks
